last_episode_to_air.name: Knotting
last_episode_to_air.overview: Brenda and Malcolm's wedding day draws near, and while Brenda remains in the dark about Joyce's present to the couple, there's a last-minute hitch concerning Malcolm's divorce.

name: Watching
overview:
A British television sitcom set on Merseyside that revolves around the relationship between Malcolm, a polite and friendly but dull man from middle-class Meols, and Brenda, a sharp-tongued, rough-around-the-edges working-class girl from Liverpool. Instead of the typical 'will they, won't they get together?', after getting together in the first episode, the show is more 'will they, won't they break up?'

Watching refers to both the acerbic people watching that Brenda does and the bird watching that Malcolm enjoys, much to the disappointment of Brenda.

Granada Television produced the show for the ITV network and broadcast for seven series and four specials between 1987 and 1993.

The series was written by Jim Hitchmough and starred Paul Bown and Emma Wray as the mismatched couple.
tagline: It was boredom at first sight!

episodes.name: Meeting
episodes.overview: Whilst indulging in her favourite hobby of people-watching with her sister Pam, Brenda meets Malcolm, a wild biker. Or is he?

episodes.name: Wrestling
episodes.overview: Brenda manages to swallow her pride and asks Malcolm to see her again. However, their relationship looks destined never to be smooth-running.

episodes.name: Outing
episodes.overview: Brenda and Malcolm arrange a day out together to Chester. However, a request from Malcolm's mother causes the pair considerable embarrassment.

episodes.name: Confusing
episodes.overview: Terry thinks Malcolm needs help with his handling of Brenda and decides to talk to her on his behalf.

episodes.name: Leaving
episodes.overview: Pamela decides she has had enough of Brenda's meddling and tells her to move out of the flat. After much heart-searching, Brenda resolves to move to London.

episodes.name: Repenting
episodes.overview: With her boss Sidney practically ignoring her, Pamela lets Brenda stay with her again. Meanwhile, Terry and Malcolm attempt to play Brenda at her own game.

episodes.name: Hiding
episodes.overview: Brenda talks Malcolm into taking her bird-watching again. Needless to say, it is downhill from there.

episodes.name: Seasoning
episodes.overview: As the festive season approaches, Brenda, Malcolm and Pamela go in search of a Christmas tree. But they are all still unsure of where they will each be spending the big day itself.

episodes.name: Falling
episodes.overview: With Pamela considering packing her job in, and Malcolm and Terry facing redundancy, Brenda will have to do some quick thinking in order to save her livelihood.

episodes.name: Dancing
episodes.overview: Pamela is getting very depressed, and Brenda and Malcolm decide she needs taking out of herself.

episodes.name: Visiting
episodes.overview: With his mother out of the way for a few days, Malcolm invites Brenda to stay.

episodes.name: Visiting II
episodes.overview: There are momentous changes in the offing for Malcolm as he prepares to start up his own motorbike repair business, and finally unties himself from his mother's apron strings by leaving home.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Having split up with Brenda and moved back in with his mother, Malcolm is unhappy in his new job with Mod Shops. So Terry decides to cheer him up.

episodes.name: Dining
episodes.overview: Pamela returns from spending the weekend in London with David, Malcolm panics after nearly inviting the wrong person out to dinner, and Brenda doesn't take kindly to being treated like riff-raff on her birthday.

episodes.name: Moving
episodes.overview: Fed up with the constant interruptions into his meetings with Pam, David decides to do something about Brenda.

episodes.name: Losing
episodes.overview: Having been relieved of her job and home in London, Brenda heads back up north to rejoin Pam and Malcolm.

episodes.name: Deceiving
episodes.overview: Brenda and Malcolm unwittingly stumble upon the dark secret of one of their acquaintances.

episodes.name: Requiting
episodes.overview: Malcolm takes Brenda to the Mod Shops annual dinner - with disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: Breeding
episodes.overview: Malcolm's new motorbike business is not doing well, so he decides on a day out with Brenda, Pam and David.

episodes.name: Wrenching
episodes.overview: With a sudden boom in business, Malcolm finds work taking up more and more of his time.

episodes.name: Wedding
episodes.overview: The day of Pam and David's wedding arrives - but Brenda can't let it go by without giving them a surprise.

episodes.name: Joking
episodes.overview: Malcolm's flourishing business is keeping him busy. Too busy. So he decides to take on an assistant.

episodes.name: Pairing
episodes.overview: Pam hires Brenda to look after Sarah for her while she goes to work in David's office for a few weeks.

episodes.name: Faultering
episodes.overview: Malcolm takes his mother to see a musical in London for her birthday, leaving Brenda alone on a Saturday night...

episodes.name: Exploding
episodes.overview: Brenda is full of regret after her moment of passion with Chris, and decides to tell Malcolm all.

episodes.name: Repairing
episodes.overview: Malcolm has forgiven Brenda for her little indiscretion, but still decides to sack Chris. Meanwhile, David and Pam's marriage suffers a rift.

episodes.name: Petting
episodes.overview: Brenda and Malcolm take in a wounded pigeon and attempt to conceal it from Malcolm's mother.

episodes.name: Floating
episodes.overview: Malcolm borrows his friend Leonard's boat to take Brenda out - but all does not go according to plan.

episodes.name: Proposing
episodes.overview: Malcolm is thinking of proposing marriage to Brenda. But he has to pick the right moment.

episodes.name: Flitting
episodes.overview: Aunty Peggy suggests Malcolm and Brenda move into her house while she is staying with Marjorie.

episodes.name: Listing
episodes.overview: Malcolm and Brenda are settling into their new life together in Peggy's house.

episodes.name: Nesting
episodes.overview: To celebrate her birthday, Pam asks Brenda and Malcolm round to meet some of her neighbours.

episodes.name: Feeding
episodes.overview: Brenda gets annoyed when everyone begins to tell her to look after Malcolm properly.

episodes.name: Wining
episodes.overview: Uncle Bernard has moved in with Malcolm and Brenda, but insists on keeping it a secret from everyone.

episodes.name: Fixing
episodes.overview: Malcolm agrees to fix Lucinda's car for her. Meanwhile, Uncle Bernard has a narrow squeak when Marjorie decides to clean the house.

episodes.name: Straying
episodes.overview: Things are hotting up with Bernard still staying at the house, Marjorie and Pamela suspecting Brenda of having an affair, and Malcolm seeing Lucinda on the quiet.

episodes.name: Homing
episodes.overview: Brenda has left Malcolm and gone back to live with her mother. But Malcolm isn't giving up that easily...

episodes.name: Suiting
episodes.overview: Pam and David attempt to reconcile Malcolm and Brenda.

episodes.name: Bonding
episodes.overview: There are differing reactions when Malcolm announces the date of his wedding... to Lucinda.

episodes.name: Presenting
episodes.overview: It's Christmas and in the Wilson and Stoneway households, the festivities are well under way. But it looks like Pam is about to receive a surprise present.

episodes.name: Slipping
episodes.overview: Malcolm and Brenda are both going on their birdwatching club's annual ""Twitch"" event in Anglesey. But they are not alone...

episodes.name: Using
episodes.overview: Pam and David are moving house, and Malcolm offers to help. Meanwhile, Brenda meets handsome medical student, Jonathan Macmillan.

episodes.name: Echoing
episodes.overview: Malcolm and Lucinda go bird-watching - at the same time as Brenda and Jonathan.

episodes.name: Doctoring
episodes.overview: Pamela insists that Jonathan use the house for a doctors' residency party, Joyce makes a nuisance of herself when Gerald runs away from home, and Brenda and Malcolm seek refuge in the Grapes.

episodes.name: Christening
episodes.overview: It's nearly Zelda's christening, and Pam and David choose Brenda, Malcolm and Lucinda as godparents.

episodes.name: Gulling
episodes.overview: Malcolm decides to end his unhappiness and leave Lucinda for Brenda.

episodes.name: Confessing
episodes.overview: Lucinda holds a small dinner party in order to announce her pregnancy. But it seems she is planning to announce more than that...

episodes.name: Reverting
episodes.overview: In the light of recent revelations, Malcolm and Brenda are back together once more, and this time it looks like it's for good.

episodes.name: Migrating
episodes.overview: Pam still wants a nanny for the children, but David has other ideas. Meanwhile, Malcolm makes a momentous decision.

episodes.name: Uncoupling
episodes.overview: Malcolm is making himself at home at the Wilsons'. But Joyce is doing all she can to get rid of him.

episodes.name: Helping
episodes.overview: Malcolm is making himself useful around the house, but Brenda is none-too-pleased and contrives to spend some time alone with him.

episodes.name: Engaging
episodes.overview: When Malcolm suggests a day out in order to ask her a question, Brenda thinks he intends to propose.

episodes.name: Wandering One
episodes.overview: When David is unable to go on holiday to Eilat, Pam takes Brenda instead.

episodes.name: Wandering Too
episodes.overview: While Pam and Brenda continue to have a wild time in Israel, back in England, Malcolm is having solicitor trouble.

episodes.name: Knotting
episodes.overview: Brenda and Malcolm's wedding day draws near, and while Brenda remains in the dark about Joyce's present to the couple, there's a last-minute hitch concerning Malcolm's divorce.
